name: 1,3-dichloropropene to generic market for pesticide, unspecified | pesticide, unspecified | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5388/documentation

This is a linking activity which links the product dichloropropene to the generic market for pesticide, unspecified. All chemicals that enter this market provide the function of a pesticide.

The activity starts with the reception of dichloropropene

The activity ends with the production of pesticide, unspecified
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: 1,3-dichloropropene is used as a pesticide in the United States, Europe, Japan, the Philippines, and Africa. It is phased out in the EU (http://eur-lex.europa.eu/LexUriServ/site/en/oj/2007/l_249/l_24920070925en00110013.pdf).

flow.name: pesticide, unspecified
